how_fairness: Normalization and quantization were adjusted to address bias in the original data.
how_transparency: n/a, focus is on ranking cause-effect pairs for experimental verification.
name: Cause-effect pairs

how_fairness: Fairness is addressed through human annotators for ground truth to avoid bias, despite minor errors in relevance labeling.
how_transparency: n/a - the competition focuses on image retrieval accuracy.
name: Google Landmark Retrieval Challenge

how_fairness: The competition addresses unfair auction activity by identifying and reducing robot bids to improve fairness for human users.
how_data_privacy: Dataset includes bidder information like id, payment account, and address, which could pose privacy concerns without explicit mitigation approaches mentioned.
how_transparency: n/a, the focus is primarily on performance for identifying bot bids.
name: Facebook Recruiting IV: Human or Robot?

how_fairness: Increased diversity in test images to measure global landmark retrieval performance more fairly.
how_transparency: n/a, focuses on retrieval performance in finding similar images.
name: Google Landmark Retrieval 2021

how_fairness: The competition increases test image diversity to ensure a fairer measurement of global landmark recognition performance.
how_transparency: n/a. The competition focuses on recognizing the correct landmark among more than 81K classes.
name: Google Landmark Recognition 2021

how_fairness: The competition mentions biases such as position bias, verbosity bias, and self-enhancement bias in preference predictions.
how_transparency: n/a, the competition focuses on predicting user preferences without specific mention of model transparency.
name: LLM Classification Finetuning

how_fairness: The competition aims to balance rules and establish a fair gameplay experience before its full launch.
name: Kore 2022 - Beta

how_fairness: The competition includes checks built into the design to ensure the results are unbiased and useful for physicists.
how_transparency: n/a, weighted AUC is the evaluation metric.
name: Flavours of Physics: Finding τ → μμμ (Kernels Only)
